content:
@Hanna Kruppe I'm circling back to finish off any work that I wasn't able to wrap up before my last year of university - next up is #66220.

As I recall, the last update here was that #65134 was reverted and we were considering splitting up the lint into two separate lints - for extern-C declarations and definitions; but I think there was still a question what to do with &Foo (where Foo: Sized).

Do you have any further thoughts or does this comment still describe your thinking? Is there anyone else to cc?
I don't think I have anything to add to the old comments, though this is pretty out-of-cache for me too
